{{Wireless embedded system |brand=Edgewater Networks |model=EdgeMarc 200 |revision=AW /A |asin=B0046CF3DM,B008MB128I;CA; |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Runtop |availability=EoL |est_release_date=2007 |fcc_id=NKRCMA, NKRCM9 |ic_id=5318A-4500 |type=wireless router, dsl modem, analog phone gateway |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1.5 |pwr_conn=barrel |fla1=8 |ram1=32 |expansion_if_types=Mini PCI |expansion_minipci_num=1 |serial=yes,, console port,, DE-9 |wi1_module=Wistron NeWeb CM9 |wi1_module_if=Mini PCI |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR5213 |wi1_chip2_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip2_model=AR5112 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL, RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |sw_cpu=true |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=4 |flags=ADSL2+, VoIP, FXS |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid=EDGEXXX |default_ssid_regex=^EDGE[0-9]{3}$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=root |default_pass=default |oui=00:0B:6B |oui_eth=00:03:6D }} {{TagLine|Converged Networking Router}} :''Wireless ADSL Router with VoIP'' • [ftp://ftp.edgewaternetworks.com/pub/docs/EdgeMarc/200/200AW_A_QuickStartGuide.pdf Quick Start Guide] *Invalid FCC ID: NKRCMA ([[Wistron NeWeb]]) • [http://ciscorouternetwork.blogspot.com/2012/04/edgewater-edgemarc-200aw-wireless.html ''EdgeMarc 200 Series'' spec.] Per the Ethernet OUI, this is a '''Runtop''' device. It is presumably using a ''[[Wistron NeWeb]]'' :wireless module.. maybe a [[Wistron NeWeb CM9]] (FCC ID: NKRCM9). ===Overview=== *Integrated ADSL2+ DSL modem works with all ADSL providers :(''AT&T, Verizon, Centurylink, Qwest, Bell, Acanac, Teksavvy'') *Integrated 802.11bg Wireless Router :Wireless supports WPA TKIP. No WPA2 support. *Integrated 4 port managed Ethernet switch with VLAN support. *Integrated VoIP (SIP and H.323) FXS and FXO ports. *Management: HTTP, HTTPS, SSH, Telnet, SNMPv1 and V3. ===See also=== *[[Edgewater Networks EdgeMarc 250W]] • [https://www.thetelecomspot.com/edgewater-networks-edgemarc-250w-2-port-enterprise-session-border-contoller-8-lanplus-1-wan-adsl-or-ethernet-plus-4-fxs-1-fxo-plus-802-11-wap-250w-100-0002.html ''EdgeMarc 200 Series'' spec.] :''EdgeMarc EM-250W - 2-Port Enterprise Session Border Contoller'' :8x LAN, 1x WAN (ADSL or Ethernet), 4x FXS/1x FXO, 802.11 WAP :;EdgeMarc 200 Series comparison {| class="wikitable sortable" cellpadding="3px" style="border: 1px solid black; border-spacing: 0px; width: 60%; text-align:center;" ! 1x FE || 1x ADSL2+,

Wi-Fi | 802.11abg || 802.11abg || - || - || 802.11bgn |- ! Serial Port | 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || 1x Male DB9 || - |- ! Power | 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/3A || 12V/3A |- ! Dimensions | 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.7"/6.3"/10.5" || 1.59"/7.1"/12" |- |} ==Images== https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/316VLvcL2eL._AC_.jpg https://images-na.ssl-images-amazon.com/images/I/51njCIv58DL._AC_.jpg https://i.ebayimg.com/images/g/FgEAAOSwSGFdUwMh/s-l500.jpg __NOTOC__
